issue.title: Fix #141901 www.tf1info.fr

comment.body:
# Remark(s)
 
:thought_balloon: Not sure if these two lines of comment are still required nowadays, by the way:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/b058daad9339b76320404d9af0ea6de20cee8390/FrenchFilter/sections/antiadblock.txt#L573-L574

issue.title: Fix #141901 www.tf1info.fr

comment.body:
# Changelog
 
### :heavy_plus_sign: Added to fix the issue

```adblock
!
! In FrenchFilter > antiadblock.txt file:
!

! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/141901#issuecomment-1434658668
tf1.fr,tf1info.fr#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'static.adsafeprotected.com/favicon.ico method:HEAD')
tf1.fr,tf1info.fr#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', '/^https:\/\/ads\.stickyadstv\.com\/$/ method:HEAD')
```

### :heavy_plus_sign: Added as bonus _(detailed comments only present here)_

```adblock
!
! In FrenchFilter > antiadblock.txt file:
!

! Other 'set-constant' stuff will prevent the AAB check request to be done,
! while this one will ensure that even if done, the result doesn't matter.
tf1.fr#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', '__TF1_CONFIG__.featureFlag.contentAccess.isAdblockCheckRequired', 'false')
```

```adblock
!
! In FrenchFilter > general_extensions.txt file:
!

! Additional disabling of video ads (tf1info.fr side)
! in addition to the generic player iframe itself stuff (just as an extra precaution).
tf1info.fr#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', '__NEXT_DATA__.runtimeConfig.playerTF1.ads.enable', 'false')
```

### :magic_wand: Changed as bonus

- **[tf1.fr, tf1info.fr]** Did the JS rules → Scriptlets migration.
  _(Thus, improving the user experience of uBlock Origin users on these popular websites.)_

- **[tf1.fr]** Fixed the rule to hide the bottom banner (about the paid "MYTF1 MAX" offer).

### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.asahi.com/sp/articles/ASQ7V6F0HQ7VPISC00X.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asahi.com%2Fsp%2Farticles%2FASQ7V6F0HQ7VPISC00X.html) ### Comment > #142556 > > I see three problems. > > 1. members-only features (the ability to bookmark articles to your account, the ability to gift paid articles to others) are blocked. These are website features, not social icons, and should not be blocked. > 2. there are buttons that do not disappear in mobile view. > 3. some buttons do not disappear on the page ( https://www.asahi.com/rensai/list.html?id=61 ). > > I have found that the following rules completely solve the problem. > > asahi.com#@#div[x-component-data^='{"shareUrl":'] > asahi.com##div[x-component-name="TwitterIcon"] > asahi.com##div[x-component-name="HatenaIcon"] > asahi.com##div[x-component-name="Dialog"] li:has([href^="mailto:"],[href*="facebook.com"],[href*="twitter.com"],[href*="hatena.ne.jp"],[href*="line.me"],[href*="note.com"]) > asahi.com##.UtilityBar ### Screenshots

issue.title: Add guildeducation.com domain to Optimizely

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

If users have the AdGuard enabled in their adblocking extensions, then they cannot load our feature flags and a/b tests. The effect is different across our product, such as missing new functionality, new styles, or new versions of existing capabilities. This is especially problematic when we expect all users of a customer to have access to a capability they have paid for.

Here are the websites we are having trouble with

`https://*.guildeducation.com`
`https://optimizely.guildeducation.com/*`
`https://*.guildeducation.com/optimizelydatafile=*`
`https://cdn.optimizely.com/datafiles/* with referrer from https://*.guildeducation.com`

### Proposed solution

Adding `guildeducation.com` to the AllowedList of domains for Optimizely .

### Additional information

Our company’s product, offered through [guildeducation.com](http://guildeducation.com/) does not serve any types of ads or ad-related materials. We are an education benefit provider, helping connect our users to debt-free education. We do use Optimizely for product management best practices of testing new offerings for our users.

comment.body:
The advertisement is blocked by List-KR filter and AdGuard Mobile Ad filter.
You can resolve your issue by the following instruction:
 1. Clear cache of KakaoTalk app.
 2. If 1st detail does not work, touch the advertisement for a while until advertisement option appears.
 2-1. Touch `Do not show this advertisement`.
 2-2. Any advertisement is no longer showed because AdGuard blocks such request.
 3. If 1st and 2nd details do not work, Please consider removing your 3rd-party filters except List-KR filter.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

그 광고는 List-KR 필터와 AdGuard 모바일 광고 필터로 차단되고 있습니다.
다음 방법으로 문제를 해결하실 수 있습니다:
  1. 카카오톡 앱의 캐시를 삭제해주세요.
  2. 첫번째 방법이 작동하지 않으면, 광고 옵션이 나올 때까지 광고를 터치하세요.
  2-1. `이 광고 보지 않기`를 누르세요.
  2-2. AdGuard가 그러한 요청을 차단하기 때문에 어떤 광고도 표시되지 않습니다.
  3. 민약 1번째과 2번째 방법이 작동하지 않으면, List-KR 필터를 제외한 제 3자 필터를 제거하는 것을 고려해주세요.

</details>

`https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pAZWv8QQ8Co`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

YouTube's description links have tracking parameters.

Example:
`https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pAZWv8QQ8Co`

In the description:
`https://www.youtube.com/redirect?event=video_description&redir_token=[...]&q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.paypal.me%2Fpaysyfr&v=pAZWv8QQ8Co`

`event`, `redir_token`, `q` being the destination link and `v` being the video id.

Proposed filters for AdGuard URL Tracking Protection:
```adb
||youtube.com/redirect?$removeparam=event
||youtube.com/redirect?$removeparam=redir_token
||youtube.com/redirect?$removeparam=v
```

Result link:
`https://www.youtube.com/redirect?q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.paypal.me%2Fpaysyfr`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

AdGuard Browser Extension

4.1.53

Dangerous site

Chrome

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

coup-ling.net, coup-ling-dm.net, gokinjolove.jp, gokinjolove.net

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

1. All scam dating sites, pls block. Some details:
`coup-ling.net, coup-ling-dm.net`: `https://sakuradot.com/article/62901.html`, `https://onijima.jp/?p=71023`
`gokinjolove.jp, gokinjolove.net`: `https://deaisamurai.com/point/gokinjolove-jp/`, `https://onijima.jp/?p=77436`

issue.title: Merge JapaneseFilter's adservers.txt and adservers_firstparty.txt for DNS
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Hello.

Japanese Filter's [adservers_firstparty.txt](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/adservers_firstparty.txt) is not included in AdGuard DNS Filter.
Therefore, some domains that should be blocked are not being blocked in AdGuard DNS.

By merging adservers.txt and adservers_firstparty.txt, AdGuard DNS users can block more ads.

<details>
<summary>example 1</summary>

###  The left image uses only AdGuard DNS DoH. The right image applies adservers_firstparty.txt using uBO My Filters.

https://dictionary.goo.ne.jp/ - `adcdn.goo.ne.jp` and `yads.yjtag.yahoo.co.jp`

![goo-dictonary](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90122968/220101951-e5efc379-c506-4a1e-bed9-68a1ff63dee9.png)
</details>

<details>
<summary>example 2</summary>

https://www.inter-edu.com/forum/read.php?2,4874690 - `ad.inter-edu.com`

![inter-edu](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90122968/220102103-6a33f286-b8cf-4c0c-9e1b-11d000c07c6d.png)
</details>

<details>
<summary>example 3</summary>

http://blog.livedoor.jp/itsoku/ - `hbb.afl.rakuten.co.jp`

![itsokuhou](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90122968/220102325-fd9698d2-a1fc-4051-a188-b42198bd6758.png)
</details>

--

In addition, some third-party domains are mixed in with the adservers_firstparty.txt, so I think that the two files are not well distinguished.

```
These domains are ad delivery service Ninja AdMax.
- ||asumi.shinobi.jp^
- ||adf.shinobi.jp^
- ||bar*.shinobi.jp^$third-party

This domain is ad platform Adingo.
- ||adingo.jp.eimg.jp^

This is ad platform Supership ScaleOut.
- ||socdm.com^

These are Yahoo Japan ad network
- ||yads.yahoo.co.jp^
- ||yads.yjtag.yahoo.co.jp^

This is Rakuten Affiliate.
- ||hbb.afl.rakuten.co.jp^$third-party
```

(This is the reason why I suggested merging.)

### Proposed solution

Merge two files, adservers.txt and adservers_firstparty.txt.

Or, adding adservers_firstparty.txt to  [AdGuardSDNSFilter/configuration.json](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/blob/master/configuration.json) will also solve the problem.

### Additional information

_No response_
